creator: Rituals Cosmetics
descriptionHtml:
Slowing down starts with our brand new app, offering you the luxurious world of Rituals at your fingertips. Relax and unwind with:

• Yoga video lessons for all skill levels

• Guided meditations for anytime & anywhere

• The most simple and seamless online shopping experience

Our team of yogis have designed yoga classes to suit your every need—be it more energy, better balance or even de-stressing after a hectic workday. With a few simple swipes of your phone, you can discover different yoga styles and what fits best into your daily routine. We offer yoga exercises for all skill levels—from beginners to yogis and everyone in between. Download the Rituals app and an inspiring yoga session is always within reach.

Meditating for just 5 minutes a day has a positive effect on body, mind and soul. That’s why we’ve incorporated many different guided meditations into our app: to help you find your centre whenever and wherever you happen to be. Our app not only teaches beginners how to meditate, it also includes meditation techniques for people who have been practicing for years. Meditate your way to higher self-esteem, more positivity and even a calmer mind. Imagine inhaling a sense of inner peace, then exhaling and letting go of stress. This is what the Rituals app can do for you.

Rituals is the #1 home & body cosmetics brand in the world, with a mission to help you slow down and find happiness in the smallest of things. We want to help make your life as easy as possible, which is why shopping with our app is so simple. In a few clicks, you’ll have your favourite Rituals luxuries delivered to your doorstep: from home fragrance to body care to advanced and natural skincare. Improved navigation, product advice and a seamless ordering process: with the Rituals app, it’s all in your hands.

Rituals processes your personal data in line with its Privacy Policy: https://www.rituals.com/en-gb/privacy-policy.html
descriptionShort: Slow down with yoga, meditation and the most seamless shopping experience ever.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: In this new version of your Rituals app, we've fixed some bugs and next to that we added our customer support so if you want, you can contact our customer support via the app. Hopefully it makes your life a little bit easier. Namasté

title: RITUALS - Cosmetics

creator: Rituals Cosmetics
descriptionHtml:
"Discover all the benefits of My Rituals – our exclusive and free membership programme – in the palm of your hand with the Rituals App. Enjoy shopping with 10% off your first order and get access to premium content like our magazine, masterclasses, podcasts, recipes and yoga and meditation exercises. Get more of what you love, to live a soulful life and boost your personal wellbeing.

My Rituals doesn’t just offer our members inspiration on slowing down and living more soulfully. Like a true friend, we also want to support the growth and development of your wellbeing—from physical and mental, to spiritual and emotional—and to help you find moments of meaning throughout your day through our products, editorial content and expert guidance. Along the way you’ll pass through different phases of your journey. Each phase unlocks unique rewards, benefits, and experiences. You’ll enjoy exclusive gifts, invitations to VIP events, tips & tricks to living more purposefully, and lots of other things we think you’ll love.

We want to help make your life as easy as possible, which is why shopping with our app is so simple. In a few clicks, you’ll have your favourite Rituals luxuries delivered to your doorstep: from home fragrance to body care to advanced and clean and conscious skincare. Improved navigation, product advice and a seamless ordering process: with the Rituals app, it’s all in your hands.

We’ve teamed up with several industry experts – like Mo Gawdat and Dr. Shelby Harris – to create masterclasses for you to follow. Whether it’s finding more positivity in your daily life or learning to improve the quality of your sleep, we’ve got the videos, tips and tricks that show you the way.

Our team of yogis have designed yoga classes to suit your every need—be it more energy, better balance or even de-stressing after a hectic workday. With a few simple swipes of your phone, you can discover different yoga styles and what fits best into your daily routine.

We’ve also incorporated many different guided meditations into our app: to help you find your centre whenever and wherever you happen to be. The app not only teaches beginners how to meditate, it also includes meditation techniques for people who have been practicing for years. Meditate your way to higher self-esteem, more positivity and even a calmer mind. Imagine inhaling a sense of inner peace, then exhaling and letting go of stress. This is what the Rituals app can do for you.

Gifting is easier than ever before with meaningful moments, providing a fuss-free way to remember special moments with your family and friends. title: RITUALS - Cosmetics

creator: Rituals Cosmetics
descriptionHtml:
Slowing down starts with our brand new app, offering you the luxurious world of Rituals at your fingertips. Relax and unwind with:

• yoga video lessons for all skill levels
• guided meditations for anytime & anywhere
• the most simple and seamless online shopping experience

Our team of yogis have designed yoga classes to suit your every need—be it more energy, better balance or even de-stressing after a hectic workday. With a few simple swipes of your phone, you can discover different yoga styles and what fits best into your daily routine. We offer yoga exercises for all skill levels—from beginners to yogis and everyone in between. Download the Rituals app and an inspiring yoga session is always within reach.

Meditating for just 5 minutes a day has a positive effect on body, mind and soul. That’s why we’ve incorporated many different guided meditations into our app: to help you find your centre whenever and wherever you happen to be. Our app not only teaches beginners how to meditate, it also includes meditation techniques for people who have been practicing for years. Meditate your way to higher self-esteem, more positivity and even a calmer mind. Imagine inhaling a sense of inner peace, then exhaling and letting go of stress. This is what the Rituals app can do for you.

Rituals is the #1 home & body cosmetics brand in the world, with a mission to help you slow down and find happiness in the smallest of things. We want to help make your life as easy as possible, which is why shopping with our app is so simple. In a few clicks, you’ll have your favourite Rituals luxuries delivered to your doorstep: from home fragrance to body care to advanced and natural skincare. Improved navigation, product advice and a seamless ordering process: with the Rituals app, it’s all in your hands.

Rituals processes your personal data in line with its Privacy Policy: https://www.rituals.com/en-us/privacy-policy.html
descriptionShort: Slow down with yoga, meditation and the most seamless shopping experience ever.

My Rituals doesn’t just offer our members inspiration on slowing down and living more soulfully. Like a true friend, we also want to support the growth and development of your wellbeing—from physical and mental, to spiritual and emotional—and to help you find moments of meaning throughout your day through our products, editorial content and expert guidance. Along the way you’ll pass through different phases of your journey. Each phase unlocks unique rewards, benefits, and experiences. Improved navigation, product advice and a seamless ordering process: with the Rituals app, it’s all in your hands.

We’ve teamed up with several industry experts – like Mo Gawdat and Dr. Shelby Harris – to create masterclasses for you to follow. Whether it’s finding more positivity in your daily life or learning to improve the quality of your sleep, we’ve got the videos, tips and tricks that show you the way.

Our team of yogis have designed yoga classes to suit your every need—be it more energy, better balance or even de-stressing after a hectic workday. With a few simple swipes of your phone, you can discover different yoga styles and what fits best into your daily routine.

title: RITUALS - Cosmetics

creator: Rituals Cosmetics
descriptionHtml:
Slowing down starts with our brand new app, offering you the luxurious world of Rituals at your fingertips. Relax and unwind with:

• yoga video lessons for all skill levels
• guided meditations for anytime & anywhere
• the most simple and seamless online shopping experience

Our team of yogis have designed yoga classes to suit your every need—be it more energy, better balance or even de-stressing after a hectic workday. With a few simple swipes of your phone, you can discover different yoga styles and what fits best into your daily routine. We offer yoga exercises for all skill levels—from beginners to yogis and everyone in between. Download the Rituals app and an inspiring yoga session is always within reach.

Meditating for just 5 minutes a day has a positive effect on body, mind and soul. That’s why we’ve incorporated many different guided meditations into our app: to help you find your centre whenever and wherever you happen to be. Our app not only teaches beginners how to meditate, it also includes meditation techniques for people who have been practicing for years. Meditate your way to higher self-esteem, more positivity and even a calmer mind. Imagine inhaling a sense of inner peace, then exhaling and letting go of stress. This is what the Rituals app can do for you.

Rituals is the #1 home & body cosmetics brand in the world, with a mission to help you slow down and find happiness in the smallest of things. We want to help make your life as easy as possible, which is why shopping with our app is so simple. In a few clicks, you’ll have your favourite Rituals luxuries delivered to your doorstep: from home fragrance to body care to advanced and natural skincare. Improved navigation, product advice and a seamless ordering process: with the Rituals app, it’s all in your hands.

Rituals processes your personal data in line with its Privacy Policy: https://www.rituals.com/en-us/privacy-policy.html
descriptionShort: Slow down with yoga, meditation and the most seamless shopping experience ever.

title: RITUALS - Cosmetics

creator: Rituals Cosmetics
descriptionHtml:
Slowing down starts with our brand new app, offering you the luxurious world of Rituals at your fingertips. Relax and unwind with:

• yoga video lessons for all skill levels
• guided meditations for anytime & anywhere
• the most simple and seamless online shopping experience

Our team of yogis have designed yoga classes to suit your every need—be it more energy, better balance or even de-stressing after a hectic workday. With a few simple swipes of your phone, you can discover different yoga styles and what fits best into your daily routine. We offer yoga exercises for all skill levels—from beginners to yogis and everyone in between. Download the Rituals app and an inspiring yoga session is always within reach.

Meditating for just 5 minutes a day has a positive effect on body, mind and soul. That’s why we’ve incorporated many different guided meditations into our app: to help you find your centre whenever and wherever you happen to be. Our app not only teaches beginners how to meditate, it also includes meditation techniques for people who have been practicing for years. Meditate your way to higher self-esteem, more positivity and even a calmer mind. Imagine inhaling a sense of inner peace, then exhaling and letting go of stress. This is what the Rituals app can do for you.

Rituals is the #1 home & body cosmetics brand in the world, with a mission to help you slow down and find happiness in the smallest of things. We want to help make your life as easy as possible, which is why shopping with our app is so simple. In a few clicks, you’ll have your favourite Rituals luxuries delivered to your doorstep: from home fragrance to body care to advanced and natural skincare. Improved navigation, product advice and a seamless ordering process: with the Rituals app, it’s all in your hands.

Rituals processes your personal data in line with its Privacy Policy: https://www.rituals.com/en-us/privacy-policy.html
descriptionShort: Slow down with yoga, meditation and the most seamless shopping experience ever.
